  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializes components for the main screen. Sets up the tables containing all parts and products in inventory, sets to a blank table if inventory is empty
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url -
      resourceBundle -

    • onPartSearch

      public void onPartSearch(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Searches for a part when the user enters an ID or partial name and presses enter. Checks for parts that match either the ID or partial name and sets the items in the table to the results. An input of an empty string resets the table to all parts in inventory.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Event caused by user pressing enter in search field on the part side

    • onAddPart

      public void onAddPart(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Loads the Add Part screen when the user clicks on the Add button.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Event cause by user clicking on Add button on the part side
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onModifyPart

      public void onModifyPart(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Loads the Modify Part screen when the user clicks on the Modify button. If no item is selected, shows error dialog box.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Event cause by user clicking on Modify button on the part side
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onDeletePart

      public void onDeletePart(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)

    • onProductSearch

      public void onProductSearch(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Searches for a product when the user enters an ID or partial name and presses enter. Checks for products that match either the ID or partial name and sets the items in the table to the results. An input of an empty string resets the table to all products in inventory.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Event caused by user pressing enter in search field on the product side

    • onAddProduct

      public void onAddProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Loads the Add Product screen when the user clicks on the Add button.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Event caused by user clicking on Add button on the product side
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onModifyProduct

      public void onModifyProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Loads the Modify Product screen when the user clicks on the Modify button. If no item is selected, shows error dialog box.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Event caused by user clicking on Modify button on the product side
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onDeleteProduct

      public void onDeleteProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Deletes the selected product when the user clicks on the Delete button. Displays error dialogs if deletion is not successful or product has associated parts. If the deletion results in an empty product inventory, resets table to empty.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Event caused by user clicking on Delete button on the product side

    • onExit

      public void onExit(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Closes the application when the Exit button is clicked.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Event cause by user clicking the exit button
